name: Standard
description: Access to gym facilities during regular hours.

name: Premium
description: Access to gym facilities during regular hours, plus additional perks like personal training sessions.

name: Elite
description: Access to gym facilities 24/7, unlimited personal training sessions, and other exclusive perks.

name: Family
description: Access to gym facilities during regular hours for up to four family members.

name: Corporate
description: Access to gym facilities during regular hours for up to 10 employees.
